column3: Traffic;Svay Rieng: Reports are saying that up to 40 people have been injured at 6.40 am on 31.07. 2019 in an accident  in front of a Sokimex near the new park
column5: Svay Rieng City.------Initial reports say that the minibus transporting factory workers collided with a truck and overturned.------UPDATE  A total of 42 passengers suffered injuries:------15 seriously injured (12 women). ------– 27 minor injuries (21 women)------The minibus taking them to work was hit bu a Hyundai truck transporting chickens  driven by a male named Shan Yuth
column6: 24. He is now in custody.------More images------Updates to follow.
